nodes.text: Torjeka was a company that manufactured scanner goggles. The pilot Denic always wore a pair of Torjeka scanner goggles while she lived on the moon Jedha during the reign of the Galactic Empire.

Torjeka was first mentioned in canon as part of a chapter quote in the novel Guardians of the Whills, which was written by Greg Rucka and released on May 2, 2017. The company was originally used in the Star Wars Legends core rulebook for the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire roleplaying game produced by Fantasy Flight Games and released on July 5, 2013.
